title: Did You Experience This Bug Last Patch?
body:
About ten minutes ago, TSM vs RNG (GO TSM) began.

Bjergsen played mid against... Someone I can't remember their name, Bjergsen as Cassipoea and the other guy as Aurelion Sol. Then, Bjergsen called over the Referees 2 minutes in. There was a bug and Bjergsen couldn't see Aurelion Sol's orbs.
So they stopped the game, checked it, and now Aurelion Sol is temporarily banned until further notice.



Just wanted to see if you experienced this bug last patch, as they are playing all of Worlds in 6.18.
???

replies.body: i haven't seen the sol since like the week after his was released
